Target.Query: select distinct wg.WasherGroupNumber,wg.WasherGroupName, case Wgt.WasherGroupTypeName when 'Tunnel' then 'True' else 'False' End as 'Is_Tunnel' from TCD.WasherGroup wg inner join TCD.WasherGroupType wgt on wg.WasherGroupTypeId=wgt.WasherGroupTypeId inner join tcd.GroupType gt on gt.GroupDescription=wg.WasherGroupName where gt.Is_Deleted=0
